Uses of Interface
bayes.BayesianNetwork

  • Packages that use BayesianNetwork 
    Package Description
    bayes
    The package that offers an implementation of Dynamic Bayesian Networks.
    gui
    The Graphical User Interface package.

    • Uses of BayesianNetwork in bayes

      Classes in bayes that implement BayesianNetwork 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BayesDyn
      Represents a Dynamic Bayesian Network (implements the BayesianNetwork interface) to be learned using Bayes Transition Graphs, meaning learning dependences between two time slices (t and t+1) which express two different relations: intra-temporal - - dependences among random variables of time slice t+1 - and inter-temporal - - dependence among random variables of time slice t and of time slice t+1 To escape local maximum, besides the random restarts, a TABU list is used to prevent the revisiting of a recently seen graph.
      class  BayesStatic
      Represents a Simple Bayesian Network (implements the BayesianNetwork interface) to be learned using Bayes Static Graphs, meaning learning dependences in the same time slice.

    • Uses of BayesianNetwork in gui

      Methods in gui with parameters of type BayesianNetwork 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> Commands.save(BayesianNetwork dbn, BayesianNetwork sbn, java.lang.String s, double time1, double time2)
      This method saves the data inside an ArrayList of Strings.
